EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder - Direct Energy Solar Invites Your Feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Customer_Survey__c.Survey_Sent_To__c}:
We recently sent you an invitation to participate in a Direct Energy Solar online survey. If you have already completed the survey, please ignore this reminder. If not, we would like to reiterate our interest in hearing about your Direct Energy Solar experience. When you have a few moments, please follow the link below to complete the survey.
Direct Energy Solar Customer Satisfaction Survey https://directenergysolar.secure.force.com/survey?Id={!Customer_Survey__c.MD5Code__c}
We truly appreciate your time and will send you a $25 Amazon gift certificate when you complete the survey. Your insights mean a great deal to us. Our leadership is founded on listening carefully to our customers’ needs and opinions.
If you need help accessing or completing the questionnaire, or if you would prefer a paper survey be sent to you, please contact us at customercare@directenergysolar.com.
We look forward to hearing from you.
Thank you.
Sincere regards,
Diane Benedetti Senior Manager Customer Care
